title: Natural Language Processing Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to easily integrate natural language processing capabilities into my applications so that elderly users can interact with ALFRED using simple, conversational commands, enhancing usability and accessibility.

title: Customizable Voice Interaction Settings
summary: As a developer, I want to implement customizable voice interaction settings so that elderly users can tailor their experience based on their preferences and needs, ensuring accessibility and usability.

title: Feedback Mechanism for User Commands
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a feedback mechanism for user commands so that older adults can receive confirmation or guidance on their interactions, enhancing user experience and ensuring they feel supported during their use of the ALFRED system.

title: Integration with Third-Party Voice Services
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate ALFRED with third-party voice services so that I can enhance user interaction and offer a wider range of accessible functionalities for elderly users.

title: User Command Personalization Features
summary: As a developer, I want to enable user command personalization so that elderly users can customize their interactions with ALFRED to better suit their preferences and technical literacy levels.

title: Support for Multi-User Voice Profiles
summary: As a developer, I want to implement multi-user voice profiles within ALFRED so that applications can provide personalized experiences for different elderly users, ensuring that interactions are tailored to individual needs and preferences.

title: Accessibility Features for Voice Interaction
summary: As a developer, I want to implement robust accessibility features for voice interaction in ALFRED so that elderly users with varying degrees of technical literacy can easily use the system and engage with their caregivers.

title: Error Handling and Recovery for Voice Commands
summary: As a developer, I want the ALFRED system to provide clear error handling and recovery mechanisms for voice commands so that users can easily understand and rectify issues without frustration, ensuring a smooth interaction experience.

title: Real-Time Speech Recognition Accuracy
summary: As a developer, I want the ALFRED system to have high accuracy in real-time speech recognition so that I can create applications that ensure elderly users can interact seamlessly and confidently with the system.

title: Documentation for Voice Command Development
summary: As a developer, I want clear and comprehensive documentation for developing voice commands so that I can create intuitive and accessible applications for elderly users and their caregivers.
